body:
Comment 1: 
Your "super yuck" line is completely reasonable if the parameters took
up many lines,
as is the blank line after the if.  We can't do everything with gofmt.
In general gofmt does not try to second-guess where you have chosen
to insert blank lines.

This won't happen until after Go 1, and even then I think it might be
a bad idea.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
